General.Name: Xinxing Ductile Iron Pipes Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinxing Ductile Iron Pipes Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of steel and iron products in China. It offers ductile iron pipes and pipe fittings, steel smelting and rolling products, casting products, steel-plastic composite pipes, steel grating, and special steel pipes; emerging cast pipes for water supply, drainage, industrial and mining water, and seawater desalination; emerging steel products, including ordinary steel, and special steel and other varieties; hot-rolled ribbed steel bars; and cold heading steel, steel strand, ink ball steel, bearing steel, fastener steel, and other special steel wire and bar products. The company also provides municipal castings, automobile castings, engineering metallurgical castings, and mining and metallurgical heavy machinery castings for automotive, iron and steel metallurgy, construction machinery, and agricultural machinery industries. In addition, it offers bimetallic composite pipes, and high-alloy steel pipes and profiles for aviation, high-speed rail, military, petroleum, petrochemical, electric power, and other fields; and rolls, tool and die steels, gas cylinder pipes, drill pipes, and other products. The company also exports its products to approximately 120 countries. Xinxing Ductile Iron Pipes Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is based in Wuan, China.
